item.description:
Hi Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Members
We enjoyed the beach so much that we decided to do it again.We will be meeting at our home and then heading to the beach in Tiverton! Hope everyone can join us-Many thanks to Robyn for the wonderful pictures! What a lovely spot!
Linda and Bob Bramwell
20 Truman St
Westport,Ma
508 673-5170

group.name: The Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Group

item.name: The Westport Boston Terrier October Meetup
